Description: Tells you how to use the player.

dialog.title: Welcome to Stories!
dialog.text:
In this tutorial, you will learn how to progress and advance through stories.
Firstly, to advance, you need to react under this message with an option accordingly.

dialog.title: Here comes 'choose your own adventure' part.
dialog.text: Every option you choose will affect the outcome of the story. This one is just a test though. An option can be grayed out or hidden if some contidions aren't met.

dialog.title: End!
dialog.text: For now, it's all. Yes it's THAT simple! But sometimes, some options will be hidden from you if you do not meet some conditions.
